dialogue.introduction: I'm Shigure, of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers. Nice to meet you.
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Shigure, second ship of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers. I was in the fated battle of Surigao Strait under the Nishimura fleet in the battle of Leyte Gulf. Fusou and Yamashiro were amazing... Even if everyone forgets, I'll always remember them...
dialogue.secretary3: You're interested in me? ... Sure. You can ask whatever you'd like.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Am I still allowed to be here...?
dialogue.secretarymarried: A hard-working Admiral is great as well. But, don't push yourself too hard, okay?
dialogue.wedding: The rain… looks like it won't stop. Admiral, you'll get soaked over there, you know? Why don’t you come a little closer. Until the rain lifts, let's stay like this.
dialogue.equipment1: Thanks. Looks like I've become a little stronger.
dialogue.equipment2: Oxygen Torpedos, huh... Sure, I'd like some.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I've troubled everybody... I'll pay it back, I promise.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship has been built.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has returned safely. I'm glad.
dialogue.attack: I will not give up here.
dialogue.mvp: My contribution to this victory is but a fraction. It's thanks to this rain... and you, Admiral.
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Stop that. It hurts, you know.
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Being able to corner me like this... well, whatever.
dialogue.sunk: Looks like this is it for me... Admiral, everyone... Goodbye.
dialogue.new_year_2015: Happy New Year, Admiral. This year, please take care of m-..please take care of us again.
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Admiral. I'd like you to have this....should I not have?
dialogue.white_day_2015: Admiral, is... this... for me? Thank you!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Admiral, the rain has stopped... Today is an important day to Shigure too!
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Admiral. There's no rain that will not stop. Yes, there's no need to worry. I, too, will always be with you. It's fine for me... to be by your side, right?
dialogue.early_summer_2015: It'll be summer pretty soon. Swimsuit? Ah, I have mine from last year, so I'll be all right.
dialogue.midsummer_2015: I wonder. The armor probably is thinner? (Kai Ni)
dialogue.fall_2015: Autumns a bit lonely isn't it? Ah, no, I'm fine.
dialogue.fall_event_2015: Is it okay for me to go on this mission? I have a kind of bad feeling about it... But, I feel like something might change if I'm with the admiral.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Eh? This outfit? You're supposed to dress like this during Christmas they said... Admiral, was it perhaps to your dislike? I'm sorry...
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: It's already end of year, huh. I should clean the fleet. The New Year's Pine decoration should also be put out. I wonder where it is?
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Throwing beans, huh... It hurts when you get hit often, doesn't it?

hourly.0000: It's now 0000 a.m. late at night. The date has changed.
hourly.0600: 0600. I will be reporting the time to Admiral for the entire day today.
hourly.1000: 1000. Admiral's job is... well, your job is Admiral. Yeah.
hourly.1100: 1100. I'm a little bit hungry too.
hourly.1200: 1200. Are you tired? Just about time, let's have lunch.
hourly.1300: 1300. To eat lunch with Admiral, I'm happy.
hourly.1400: 1400. Do your best with your afternoon duties as well.
hourly.1500: 1500. Are you interested in the rankings?
hourly.1600: 1600. Thanks for your hard work, Admiral.
hourly.1800: 1800. It would have been nice if I could help.
hourly.2000: 2000. It's time for night battles... It has become noisy.
hourly.2200: 2200. Take it easy. Yes, I am, too.
hourly.2300: 2300. It will be the closing time for Shigure of Sasebo today.
